meanings.definition: The act of renewing a license or certification.
meanings.sent1: After completing the necessary training, she applied for relicensure.
meanings.sent2: Relicensure is important to ensure professionals stay updated in their field.
meanings.sent3: The relicensure process felt like a refresher course on all the rules.
meanings.sent4: For her, relicensure was like a badge of honor, showing her dedication.
meanings.sent5: The relicensure exam was a hurdle she had to overcome to continue working.

meanings.definition: The process of obtaining a new license after a period of expiration.
meanings.sent1: He had to go through relicensure to get back his driving license.
meanings.sent2: Relicensure can be a lengthy process but is necessary for safety.
meanings.sent3: The relicensure paperwork seemed like a maze he had to navigate.
meanings.sent4: To him, relicensure was a fresh start after a temporary setback.
meanings.sent5: The relicensure interview was his chance to prove his skills once again.

meanings.definition: The requirement to undergo a reevaluation of qualifications for licensure.
meanings.sent1: The relicensure criteria were strict to ensure high standards.
meanings.sent2: Relicensure may involve additional training to meet the criteria.
meanings.sent3: Going through relicensure felt like a test of her abilities.
meanings.sent4: To her, relicensure was a chance to showcase her expertise.
meanings.sent5: The relicensure process pushed her to improve and excel in her profession.
